subtitleNullable: A dataset consisting of 12500 movies for building recommendation systems
descriptionNullable:
### Context Use the dataset to recommend movies by applying content based filtering. Learn about content based filtering here ### Content Scraped around 12500 movies from IMDB using Scrapy. The description of the columns is as follows:
  • cast_crew : The director(s) and main cast of the movie
  • description: A short summary about the movie
  • genre: The genre of the movie
  • gross: Money earned by the movie
  • imdb_score: The imdb rating of the movie
  • movie_name: The name of the movie
  • rating: Film Rating. for e.g. PG-13
  • runtime: The duration of the movie
  • votes: Vote count
### Acknowledgements IMDB ### Inspiration Try to recommend relevant movies using techniques like content based filtering
title: IMDB MOVIES
subtitle: A dataset consisting of 12500 movies for building recommendation systems
description:
### Context Use the dataset to recommend movies by applying content based filtering. Learn about content based filtering here ### Content Scraped around 12500 movies from IMDB using Scrapy. The description of the columns is as follows:

  • movie_name: The name of the movie

  • runtime: The duration of the movie
